Name: restoreSongs
Desc:
Restore Mystia's Song mechanics from FMW4
NOTE: FMW4 song buffs are limited to 
1 type active at a time.
Future songs will overwrite the previous buff, 
if applicable.
Song effects below (w/o Valor/Songstress boost)





- SotnS: Accuracy/Evade stats +30
-- MAP: Centered-radius, targets Team
Accuracy/Evade +20
- HotHO: Defense stat +30/Skill stat +15 
-- MAP: Centered-radius, Defense +20/Skill +10 
- MCM: Cqb/Range/Accuracy stats +40 
-- MAP: Centered-radius
Cqb/Range/Accuracy +20
